front.title: Communicating Proxy Configurations in Provisioning Domains

abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism for accessing provisioning domain information associated with a proxy, such as other proxy URIs that support different protocols and a list of DNS zones that are accessible via a proxy. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/tfpauly/privacy-proxy.
